text:
The Daily Show Presents: A Live Election Special

Indecision 2024: Nothing We Can Do About It Now

Jon Stewart and the news team provide live election night results with analysis, interviews, commentary and more.
title: Comedy Central The Daily Show Fan Page

meta_data.description: The source for The Daily Show fans, with episodes hosted by Jon Stewart, Ronny Chieng, Jordan Klepper, Dulcé Sloan and more, plus interviews, highlights and The Weekly Show podcast.
